humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there were 21 lymph node candidates in the axillary dissection, and 3 of them were positive for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that out of 21 axillary lymph nodes examined, 3 were positive for metastatic carcinoma. This means that the patient has 1 to 3 positive axillary lymph nodes, which corresponds to N1 stage. There is no mention of any other distant metastasis, so we can ignore any substaging information.
